title: Looking for a luxury apartment in the heart of Philadelphia
description:
Looking for a luxury apartment in the heart of Philadelphia? A blend of vintage charm and modern comfort, The Franklin Residences offers one and two bedroom apartments in Philadelphia, PA, with an unparalleled lifestyle. Live in a historic building with contemporary amenities, centrally located in Washington Square West, offering the best of Philly footsteps from your front door. The Franklin Residences is an iconic high-rise in Philadelphia with a rich history that has been transformed into a luxury apartment community with unparalleled conveniences. Have the best of both worlds – historic charm and modern living in Center City, Philadelphia, apartments today! Formerly known as the Benjamin Franklin Hotel, the Franklin Residences transports you to a different time once you step inside. A grand lobby with soaring ceilings, dazzling chandeliers, and golden accents welcomes you home. This timeless design boasts contemporary comforts including a state-of-the-art fitness center and a brand new business lounge with flexible workspaces and private conference and meeting rooms. Our friendly, attentive teaem is at your service, providing concierge service 24 hours a day. Our luxury apartments in Philadelphia feature one and two-bedroom, spacious layouts. They boast expansive windows, 10-foot ceilings, soundproof walls, large dining areas, washers and dryers, and come in a variety of finishes to fit your needs. Our community is also pet-friendly, and your furry companions will feel right at home with nearby green space and pet-themed resident events like Yappy Hours. The best of Philadelphia begins at our front door! Theaters, cultural landmarks, and endless sightseeing opportunities in the Historic District, world-class restaurants in Midtown Village, and the green spaces of Washington Square are only minutes away. description:
It is my distinguished honor to present to you 436 E. Thompson St. available for immediate occupancy. Located in the Heart of Fishtown, along the Delaware River, anchored by Commercial Mixed Use Corridors, including South St, and surrounded by residential properties, this property is situated at the intersection of a quaint & quiet neighborhood. This 3 story new construction townhouse features high end finishes and rooftop space. There is currently an occupant in the building and we are searching for 2 additional roommates. There is a 1 bedroom with a shared bathroom on the 2nd floor renting for $1050/month and a 3rd story bedroom loft with private en suite bathroom renting for $1475/month. The property is filled with radiant natural light and illumination from large windows. Walk upstairs to the 2nd floor with 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. Continue up the winding staircase to the 3rd story bedroom loft with intricate dimensions and angles allowing for extra ceiling height. The 3rd floor has a loft bedroom and private en suite bathroom. The property is close to bus stops and close to multi-modal public transportation, commercial mixed used corridors with many retail businesses, food establishment, and other entertainment and amenities. description:
P1804 is a fully custom Northwestern exposure, CORNER unit with BALCONY in the Peninsula. The unit features new hardwood flooring through the living room and secondary bedroom, and custom carpet in the primary bedroom. The unit can be rented PARTIALLY FURNISHED. The kitchen has new custom cabinetry, Carrara marble slabs for counters as well as backsplash, and a new stainless steel full appliance package! All living spaces are surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows. Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa is a premier gated community offering 24/7 guard and gate, as well as concierge, valet parking, pool and hot tub with river deck, fitness center, sauna and steam room, massage rooms and community rooms. There is a 3- level garage, with Philadelphia's largest green roof situated on top, inclusive of putting green! Waterfront Square resides on a 9.5-acre riverfront enclave, with lush manicured outdoor common parks and gardens right on the river's edge. Management is on site, and Waterfront boasts an advanced security system with closed-circuit television. For your convenience, Global Limousine runs on site Monday-Friday, taking residents as far as 30th street and back home to their gated community. The river deck is oversized, encompassing a 25-meter heated lap pool (junior Olympic). Waterfront Square has an excellent location, due to its proximity to area highways & airports (676,95, all bridges), yet is nestled away on the Delaware River - the best of both worlds! If its unequivocal luxury, showcasing the best views in Philadelphia, adorned with amenities, then it must be Waterfront Square Condominium & Spa!

title: Single Private Home in Fairmount Park
description:
Location!  Location!  Location!
This one of a kind home features a wondrous view of the park because you are in the park! You'll forget the city but will be only a snap away from everything. If you need to use public transportation, it's located only a block away on Henry Avenue. The local train station is just minutes away. Own a car? The property accommodates a minimum of three vehicles. It is easy access to the Schuylkill Expressway and minutes away from major hospitals and colleges. Main Street Manayunk where there is fine dining, entertainment and unique shops is only a mile away. But the true treasure of this gem is its quiet, cozy, peaceful ambience that is rarely found in the city. The house is 2150 sq ft with a very large back patio overlooking the woods which is great for entertaining and cookouts. The house features 2.5 baths, 4 bedrooms, a sitting room, a bonus room which could be used as a breakfast room, plenty of cabinets in the full kitchen, stone fireplace in the living room, full dining room, lots of storage, hardwood floors throughout and washer/dryer in a large basement. If stairs are a hardship, the first floor includes a full bath and bedroom. The rent is $2,350.00 per month plus utilities, excluding water. The yard work is not tenant's responsibility. Required first, last and security to move in and excellent credit for all persons over 18. For a showing or more information either call or text  - Contact Kyle -  show contact info

title: Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bed, 2.5 bath end unit
description:
Just Listed for Rent! Beautiful Naval Square, 2-story, lower level 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath end unit with attached garage! Situated down a lovely, lush, landscaped pathway, this well maintained home features a private terrace spanning the entire width of the property. 1st floor: open concept living/dining space, discreet 1/2 bath, expansive kitchen with stainless appliance package, white shaker style cabinetry, stone counters, large pantry & marble backsplash. Gorgeous hardwood flooring, and plenty of recessed lights grace the entire first level. Large coat/ storage closet located underneath the stairs.
2nd floor: spacious owner’s retreat with oversized walk-in-closet completely outfitted with built-ins, luxe bath with private WC, linen closet, dual sinks, soaking tub & separate stall shower. Granite and tile upgrades. 2 additional sun-filled bedrooms boast 8 ft french sliders leading to a large covered terrace. Laundry area with washer/dryer and a shared hall bath complete this level. Abundant built-in storage closets & shelving located in the garage. Neutral paint throughout. Naval Square amenities: concierge, gated community with 24-hour security, state-of-the-art fitness center, heated outdoor pool, ample visitor parking, spacious common room in Biddle Hall (available for private functions). Enjoy the outdoor amenities of the 20-acre park-like setting, including picnic areas, well-kept gardens & mature Sycamore trees. Very close proximity to South Street Bridge, UPenn, CHOP, HUP & Drexel. Exciting restaurants, shops, & cafes located just outside the gates in Graduate Hospital, Fitler Square, & Rittenhouse Square. Brand new Heirloom Market by Giant just steps outside the community! Directly out the back gate you can enjoy the Schuylkill River Park, including the award winning-trail & boardwalk and Markward Playground! Landlord prefers 2 year lease. Available Feb 15th 2023.
111 Commodore Ct

title: Rent this gorgeous rowhome on Madison Square, one of Philadelphia's un
description:
Rent this gorgeous rowhome on Madison Square, one of Philadelphia's unique and coveted "Garden Blocks". Enjoy the quiet walk along this historical pedestrian-only street to your front door, and enter the new light & airy living space designed for modern living. Be greeted by the 1st floor open concept living space that includes a fully-equipped kitchen enhanced by striking chandeliers, a custom range hood, enormous gas cooktop and oven, with a large island / breakfast bar. The white cabinetry, designer appliances and all living spaces are enhanced by brass-toned hardware, exposed beams and warm woodwork throughout. The first floor also provides access your designer half bath and rear patio. Staircases leading down to the finished basement and up to the 2nd floor bedrooms feature attractive woodwork. The 2nd floor showcases 2 large bedrooms with ample closet space along with a full hall bath. The primary bedroom features an en-suite bathroom with spacious shower. This newly renovated home is situated in the heart of Graduate Hospital and is a short walking distance to Center City, Philadelphia's central business district. This home also has excellent access to University City, which includes the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia complex and the University of Pennsylvania. This home may also be rented with furnishings for a total of $4000 per month. 1st and last month's rent plus security deposit equal to 3 month's rent payment required before move-in.
